::: {.profile-text}
# Safa Obuz

## *Robots, Vision, and Learning*

I'm a Computer Vision Research Assistant at the [Visual Intelligence Lab](https://github.com/VILab-Drexel) advised by [Dr. Feng Liu](https://liufeng2915.github.io/) at Drexel University. I'm largely interested in robotics, computer vision, mathematics, computer graphics, and simulation.

I am currently working in the sub-field of 3D reconstruction with an emphasis on dataset and model viability for downstream use cases (robotics).

[GitHub](https://github.com/SafaObuz) | [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/safaobuz/)
:::
:::

<h2>Notes</h2>

::: {.notes-description}
I'm an avid note taker. I aim for my [notes](notes/index.html) page to be a public collection of refined course notes. Similarly, I aim for my [papers](papers/index.html) page to be a collection of paper summaries. This effort is currently a work in progress. 

This section is a play-on-words of the tagline for my site, *Robots, Vision, and Learning*. Here, *learning* both literally refers to learning and studies (hence the learning resources), but also *machine* learning :)
:::
